/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, construction cranes hint at the ongoing development and growth of the city. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
